privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This website respects and protects your privacy. To provide a better browsing experience and advertising services, this website uses the following third-party services:

google_analytics.title: 1. Google Analytics (GA)
google_analytics.content: We use Google Analytics to analyze website traffic and user behavior. This service may collect anonymous statistical data including your IP address, device information, and user behavior.
google_analytics.privacy_policy: For information about how Google Analytics processes data, please refer to their

google_adsense.title: 2. Google AdSense Advertising
google_adsense.content: We use Google AdSense to provide content-related advertisements. Google and its partners may serve ads based on your Cookie information.
google_adsense.settings: You can adjust personalized ad settings in

cookies.title: 3. Cookie Usage
cookies.content: This website may use cookies to store user preferences and statistical information. You can restrict or delete cookies through your browser settings.

third_party_links.title: 4. Third-Party Website Links
third_party_links.content: This website may contain links to third-party websites. These websites are not bound by this policy, please refer to their respective privacy policies.

privacy.agreement: By using this website, you agree to the terms of this policy.
privacy.contact: If you have any questions, please contact us through the contact information provided on the website.

metadata.privacy_page_description: Learn about our privacy policy and data processing methods.
metadata.privacy_page_keywords: privacy policy, data protection, Google Analytics, Google AdSense, Cookie, third-party services
